titleStmt.title: The Kings entertainment at Guild-Hall or, Londons option in fruition.
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, b. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Milbourn, for Rowland Reynolds at the Sun and Bible in the Poultery [sic],

notesStmt.note: Signed: By John Norton, AEtat. suae.
Verse: "COome all ye Muses nine, assist me pray ..."
Imperfect: cropped at side with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
